name: Warrior
description: Disciplined fighters who excel in physical combat, mastering weapons and martial techniques to overcome enemies through strength, skill, and tactical prowess.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and martial techniques
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform special combat maneuvers and martial techniques
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Short rests restore a portion of maximum stamina
Depleted stamina causes penalties to attack speed and defensive capabilities
Can be temporarily boosted through adrenaline in critical situations
Successful combat maneuvers can restore a portion of stamina

resource_systems.name: Combat Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration and battlefield awareness that enhances combat effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decreases during periods of inaction
mechanics: Increases by 10 when landing critical hits or successfully executing combat maneuvers
Increases by 5 per 10 seconds in active combat
Decreases by 10 when taking significant damage or being stunned
Decreases by 5 per minute when out of combat
Can be spent to enhance combat abilities or execute special techniques
Higher Combat Focus increases critical hit chance and defensive reactions

class_mechanics.name: Weapon Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Exceptional skill with a wide variety of weapons
effects: Can effectively use any conventional weapon with minimal training
Able to identify optimal weapons for specific combat situations
Can maintain and repair weapons with basic materials
Presence naturally intimidates less skilled combatants
Can analyze and counter enemy fighting styles through weapon techniques

class_mechanics.name: Combat Expertise
class_mechanics.description: Comprehensive understanding of combat tactics and techniques
effects: Can quickly assess combat situations and identify tactical advantages
Able to adapt fighting style to counter specific opponents
Can predict enemy movements and attacks with increased accuracy
Presence enhances the combat effectiveness of allies
Can identify and exploit weaknesses in enemy defenses

class_mechanics.name: Physical Conditioning
class_mechanics.description: Superior physical strength, endurance, and toughness
effects: Can endure physical hardship and continue fighting despite injuries
Able to perform feats of strength beyond normal human capabilities
Can maintain peak combat performance for extended periods
Presence projects an aura of physical power and capability
Can recover from injuries and fatigue more quickly than others

class_mechanics.name: Battlefield Awareness
class_mechanics.description: Enhanced perception and understanding of combat environments
effects: Can quickly assess terrain and environmental factors for tactical advantage
Able to maintain awareness of multiple opponents simultaneously
Can identify potential threats and ambush points in any environment
Presence improves the tactical positioning of nearby allies
Can anticipate and counter battlefield hazards and complications

skill_trees.name: Weapon Specialist
skill_trees.focus: Mastery of specific weapon types and techniques
key_abilities: Weapon Expertise: Gain significant bonuses with chosen weapon types
Combat Techniques: Master specialized attacks and maneuvers
Weapon Versatility: Switch between different weapons with no penalty

skill_trees.name: Battlefield Tactician
key_abilities: Tactical Advantage: Identify and exploit weaknesses in enemy formations
Combat Awareness: Maintain perfect battlefield awareness in chaotic situations
Strategic Positioning: Control the flow of battle through superior positioning

skill_trees.name: Combat Specialist
skill_trees.focus: Advanced combat techniques and physical prowess
key_abilities: Combat Mastery: Execute perfect attacks and defenses in any situation
Physical Dominance: Overwhelm opponents with superior strength and endurance
Battle Hardened: Resist and recover from injuries with exceptional speed

arch_classes.name: Battlemaster
arch_classes.description: Warriors who have refined their combat skills to become elite battlefield commanders, combining personal martial prowess with tactical leadership.

lore: Warriors represent the pinnacle of martial combat, having dedicated their lives to mastering the art of warfare in all its forms. Unlike the mystical powers of mages or the divine blessings of clerics, warriors rely on physical prowess, combat training, and tactical acumen to overcome challenges. Their training encompasses not just weapon skills and fighting techniques but also battlefield tactics, physical conditioning, and mental discipline, making them versatile combatants in any conflict. Many warriors begin their careers in military organizations or martial academies, where they can develop their skills under experienced instructors. Others are self-taught fighters who developed their abilities through necessity or natural talent. Regardless of their background, all warriors share a respect for discipline, preparation, and the practical application of combat skills. In dangerous situations, warriors excel at controlling the battlefield through superior positioning and tactical awareness, adapting their approach to counter specific threats and protect vulnerable allies. Their ability to endure physical hardship and continue fighting despite injuries makes them reliable front-line combatants in extended conflicts. Though they may lack the flashy abilities of more magical classes, the consistent effectiveness and tactical versatility of warriors often prove decisive in challenging encounters where skill and discipline triumph over raw power.
